name: Viscous
description:
Thanks and credits to everyone that participated in this games creation process (even if indirectly):

Rosilane Mota (for mentoring the production of this game)

Eduardo Crivellari (for Grease's animation)

Victor Gabriel (for the Level Design)

Isadora Souza (for the sounds, yet to be released)

Eduardo Christian (for the game testing and benchmarking)

Craftpix (at craftpix.net, for the awesome tilesets and pixel art assets used in this project)

MD Szadi (at artstation and itch.io, for the great pixel art asset work used in the game and as inspiration)

Reff SQ (at www.reffsq.com, and itch.io for the great pixel art work used as reference and inspiration)

KingKelpo (at itch.io, for the great animated pixel art gif asset)

Unity (for the amazing game engine, and community)

Brackeys (at youtube, for the amazing unity tutorials)

ArcOfDream (at itch.io, for the music in the temporary trailer)

there were probably more, and Im sorry if I forgot anyone.
